data.title: Pegasus Traction Batteries
data.meta_description: Pegasus Batteries are a long life and high performance traction battery solution making them one of the most cost-effective on the market.
data.text:
Pegasus 6v/12v traction batteries are our own unique brand of motive power, cleaning machine & access platform battery. A tough traction battery designed to offer long life, high performance and be cost effective, requiring minimal maintenance and subsequently minimal downtime. Pegasus batteries offer a great solution for fleet implementations or individual traction battery units, or for specialist products where battery power and performance is key. Pegasus traction batteries come in both Flat Plate & Tubular Wet Vented versions, as well as a Sealed Gel & AGM version. Pegasus traction batteries come in a range of sizes and connection (terminal) types suitable for multiple traction power/motive power applications.

PB Flat Plate

The Pegasus PB range of traction battery/deep cycle monoblock flat plate series has advanced flat grid plates and paste formulation, giving extended service life. It is especially suited to arduous deep cycle semi traction applications and has a productive run-time.

The Pegasus PB range of traction battery/deep cycle monoblock tubular series consists of robust tubular positive plate with free electrolyte to ensure a long operating life. These traction batteries offer a premium level of performance as well as a premium life expectancy.

Read more: PB Flat Plate

PB Tubular

The Pegasus PB range of traction battery/deep cycle monoblock tubular series consists of robust tubular positive plate with free electrolyte to ensure a long operating life. These traction batteries offer a premium level of performance as well as a premium life expectancy.

Read more: PB Tubular

Sealed Gel & AGM

The Pegasus GB dry traction battery series are valve-regulated lead-acid batteries. Unlike conventional traction batteries with liquid electrolyte these traction batteries have immobilised electrolyte (gelled sulphuric acid or AGM). The Pegasus GB traction batteries offer maintenance free power solutions for all types of traction, telecoms, ups and standby power needs.

Read more: Sealed Gel & AGM

Motive Power 2 Volt Cells

2 volt motive power cells from Battery Service Hub Ltd are designed to offer you long life and high performance, making them incredibly cost-effective. These tough industrial cells require minimal maintenance which subsequently means minimal downtime.

Read more: Motive 2 Volt Cells

Traction Battery Charge/Discharge Data

6v & 12v traction battery charge and discharge information for both wet flat plate and wet tubular battery types from the Pegasus traction battery range.
